name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent v. Joseph A. ELLIOTT, Petitioner

parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent v. Joseph A. ELLIOTT, Petitioner.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 11th day of February, 2011, the “Motion for Reinstatement of PCRA Appeal Rights Nunc Pro Tunc and an Order Allowing Notice of Cross-Appeal to be Filed Nunc Pro Tunc, or for a Remand for Those Purposes,” is GRANTED. Petitioner shall file a notice of cross-appeal within 14 days of our order.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
13 A.3d 463
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent v. Joseph A. ELLIOTT, Petitioner.
No. 153 EM 2010.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Feb. 11, 2011.
